message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 to us, reflecting its unique features and benefits. Considering its unmatched capabilities, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $11000. This is an excellent chance to secure a remarkable asset at a favorable discount. I look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a purchase price up to $10000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a compromise that could potentially benefit both of us. I am willing to consider a purchase price of $10500 for the product. This still allows me to maintain a reasonable profit margin while offering you a competitive price. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and we can move forward towards a mutually beneficial agreement.
